code: import React from"react";import{Col,Row}from"react-bootstrap";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Skills=function Skills(){var _useTranslation=useTranslation(),t=_useTranslation.t;var data=[{title:t('experienced'),value:90},{title:t('reliable'),value:100},{title:t('qualified'),value:95},{title:t('flexible'),value:90}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"justify-content-between align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:"6",className:"my-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"px-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fs-5 main-text",children:t('about_us')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fs-1 fw-bold",children:t('about_title')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"fw-light fs-5 my-3",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:t('about_text')}})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:"5",className:"my-3",children:data.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between fs-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[item.value,"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-item mt-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:"".concat(item.value,"%")},className:"progress-content",id:"myProgressBar"})})]},index);})})]});};export default Skills;
